Hero.h2: Empower your entire team with AI-driven contextual feedback, supporting all languages, and cut code review time and errors in half.

Feature.description1: Based on best practices accumulated in the knowledge base, support customized repository-level code review standards and intelligent Code Review for all mainstream programming languages.
Feature.description2: Combining knowledge base experience with LLM analysis, provide professional scoring and improvement suggestions for single file code changes, seamlessly integrate with GitHub workflow for automated Code Review.
Feature.description3: Based on all file code changes, provide comprehensive review reports including code walkthrough, change description and sequence diagrams through LLM, and support customized language for Code Review feedback.
